alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 2:10AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Benton, northwestern Washington, southeastern Delaware, northern Adair and northeastern Cherokee Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 210 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Oaks to 2 miles northwest of Christie. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Siloam Springs... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Gentry... Tontitown... Gravette... Lincoln... Decatur... Westville... Greenland... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... Watts... Oaks... Springtown... Christie... Cincinnati... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 56 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
